files.description: Comprehensive checklist describing required rights/licensing fields and review steps that must be completed for every exemplar entry used in case studies.
CSV template rights log with required columns (URL, license type, rights holder, permission status, allowed uses) to be filled for each exemplar entry referenced by case studies.
Python validator that parses case study files to find exemplar URLs and fails if any exemplar lacks a complete corresponding entry in outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv with all required fields populated.

missionDescription: Add /outputs/RIGHTS_AND_LICENSING_CHECKLIST.md and /outputs/RIGHTS_LOG.csv with fields for URL, license type, rights holder, permission status, and allowed uses; require completion for each exemplar entry in case studies.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
